name: Mango Smoothie
description: You will love this creamy mango smoothie! It's super easy to make, incredibly delicious, and completely plant-based. An easy treat that is ready in only 5 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plant-based yogurt  ((unsweetened soy or coconut yogurt))

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all of the ingredients in a blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Process until smooth. Fill the smoothie into two glasses and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Process until smooth. Fill the smoothie into two glasses and enjoy!

keywords: how to make a mango smoothie, mango smoothie, mango smoothie recipe
